reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 621: SPEED LIMITS IN TERRITORY WITHOUT MUNICIPAL ORGANIZATION
reg_info.reg_name_text: SPEED LIMITS IN TERRITORY WITHOUT MUNICIPAL ORGANIZATION

content.content: 1. No person shall drive a motor vehicle on that part of a highway located in territory without municipal organization described in paragraph 1 of each Schedule at a greater rate of speed than that prescribed in paragraph 2 of each Schedule.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 621, s. 1. Schedule 1
content.raw_html:
1. No person shall drive a motor vehicle on that part of a highway located in territory without municipal organization described in paragraph 1 of each Schedule at a greater rate of speed than that prescribed in paragraph 2 of each Schedule.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 621, s. 1.

Schedule 1

content.content: 1. That part of the highway known as Kam Current Road in the unorganized Township of Gorham in the Territorial District of Thunder Bay beginning at a point situate at its intersection with the King’s Highway known as No. 589 and extending westerly a distance of 650 metres.

content.content: 2. Sixty kilometres per hour. O. Reg. 11/03, s. 1. Schedule 2
content.raw_html:
2. Sixty kilometres per hour.
